with the following assets:Please forward your applications and auditions to [https://docs.google.com/.../1FAIpQLSexwYdewcS.../viewform...](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSexwYdewcScTMfl0wcXOSLiTFeC-7WdaXT-eC6G8v6VDP9D4Q/viewform?usp=sf_link&fbclid=IwAR07f02q-gBK0Lytri2uPlOxVsZvmhU-M7Z7Sjs4tmSRRBf_kmQ0gakqQRg)

A portrait or headshot

Your name

Your age

Your tel & email

A video recording of yourself acting out the sample script (more details below)

Or email it to sondageperspectives@gmail.com

Video Audition

Please choose one of the following scripts below based on the age range and character-type you‚Äôd like to audition for, and record yourself reading that character‚Äôs lines.

Script 1 (Male auditions): see page 2

Script 2 (Female auditions): see page 3

Submission Deadline: Wednesday June 8th, 11 AM

SCRIPT 1: Male Audition Script Read

Adam: *Sees Matt coming out of a room* Hey! What did you think about the exam?

Matt: You guys want to know a secret?

Adam: *Confused Look* Secret? Sure?

Matt: Okay but promise me you won‚Äôt tell ANYBODY!

Adam: *exhales* I promise.

Matt: *Whispers slowly* I cheated.

Adam: You what?!? That is not okay!

Matt: Shhh it‚Äôs okay, everyone cheats, what‚Äôs the big deal?

Adam: It‚Äôs not fair for people like me who put in the work to study for these exams! Plus, the professor asked us to report any incidence of cheating and its university policy.

Matt: Can you calm down! I might fail the course if the professor finds out that I cheated. Plus, any cheating violation will be on my transcript so future employers might not hire me. I have so much to lose.

Adam: Yeah but...*Gets interrupted by Matt*

Matt: Look, you promised me that you won‚Äôt tell anybody. So, I‚Äôm trusting you. Anyways I'm getting late for my next class, I‚Äôll talk to you later. *Walks out of frame*

Adam: *Stares into camera with a stressed attitude* This is not okay...We need to do something about this.

SCRIPT 2: Female Audition Script Read

Emily: *Looks at Claire and camera* I can‚Äôt wait to get off work.

Claire: Me too! Do you guys have any plans for the weekend?

Emily: I‚Äôm actually going on a date tomorrow!

Claire: What! Who‚Äôs the lucky man?

Emily: *Hesitates* Uhh...Uhh...*Looks at Claire and camera* promise me you both won‚Äôt tell anyone.

Claire: *Confused Look while looking at camera* Okay?... We promise.

Emily: *Gasp* It‚Äôs Dave.

Claire: Dave?!?, our manager?

Emily: Shhh calm down it‚Äôs not a big deal.

Claire: It‚Äôs against company policy for co-workers to date. This could end up being really bad for both of you. Just last month, 2 employees got fired for dating each another.

Emily: Well, Dave is the manager, so no one is going to know, and you better stay quiet about it. Remember, you promised me that you won‚Äôt tell anyone!

Claire: *Stares into camera and gasps*

UNPAID CASTING CALL

items.summary:
CASTING CALL NOTICE

UNPAID CASTING CALL 

DATES: 01/02/26-01/09/26
WHERE: Yellville, Arkansas & St. Louis, Missouri
COMPENSATION: Housing, Food, Credit, Copy for Reel (Traveling costs can be discussed)

THIS FILM DEALS WITH SEXUAL ASSAULT, VIOLENCE AGAINST WOMEN, UNDERAGE SMOKING AND DRINKING, AND SEXUAL SCENARIOS AND THEMES. IF THIS IS TRIGGERING FOR YOU, PLEASE DO NOT AUDITION. We need actors who are able to portray these characters without harming their mental wellbeing.

Tell Them is a psychological thriller directed by Gray Love Campbell and produced by Magdalene Harper and Griffin Smith. Eight friends - Luke, Jack, Theo, Emmett, Lottie, Noah, Melody, and Stevie - are excited for a weekend getaway to a remote cabin that‚Äôs guaranteed to be filled with drinking, smoking, dumb games, and some messy hook ups. When a game of spin the bottle goes awry, a dark secret about Jack and Stevie is revealed. The night is ruined and all hell breaks loose. Stevie tries to disappear and gain her composure. In her emotional state, she clings to the only person there for her: Theo. It‚Äôs heated. It‚Äôs desperate. It‚Äôs- quickly ended. After a mean joke, Theo snaps and kills Stevie.  When the group downstairs hears the commotion and come across the body, the only thing they can do is to cover up what‚Äôs been done‚Ä¶ by blaming someone else.

CHARACTERS NEEDED:
Theo (21) - Male. White. Lean or average build but is deceptively strong. 

Noah (20) - Female. White. Blonde with a commanding presence.

Jack (21) - Male. White. Tall, muscular, and handsome.

Lottie (20) - Female. White. Brunette.

Luke (20) - Male. White. Queer. Lanky and lean frame with a feminine and/or androgynous edge.

Emmett (21) - Male. Asian. Average-appearing young man.

Melody (18) - Female. Black. Petite with delicate features.

Stevie (20) - Female. Hispanic. Curvy.

Detective Scott (50s‚Äô) - Male. White.

Detective Garcia (30s‚Äô) - Female. Hispanic.

PLEASE AUDITION THROUGH THE GOOGLE FORM ATTACHED TO THIS POST BY OCTOBER 15TH.

Thank you!

items.title: Zelda and David, a recently separated couple, are locked in a bitter custody bat‚Ä¶
items.summary:
Zelda and David, a recently separated couple, are locked in a bitter custody battle over their daughter, Ava. When they reunite with their new partners under one roof, tensions escalate into a dark, twisted game‚Äîeach couple secretly plotting to poison the other in a desperate bid for sole custody. 

Inspired by Impressionism, this film uses light as a metaphor for time to explore the shifting nature of human relationships. As spaces and objects remain unchanged, emotions disintegrate‚Äîwhat once nurtured love now houses its unraveling.

Korean director Won Jang, whose award-winning short film The Stench garnered critical acclaim, is deeply committed to directing this project. As both the writer and the original source of inspiration, he brings a unique personal vision to the story. He believes his intimate connection to the material makes him best suited to authentically convey the characters' emotions in his feature debut.

Key Information

Shooting Dates - 5th-15th October 2025

Shooting Location - We will be filming in a house near Camelford, Cornwall. You will need to be able to drive to location as public transport doesn‚Äôt reach it. Alternatively if you‚Äôre London based or in the South of England, we can provide accommodation on set.

Rates

The main characters:  ¬£100 a day 

Fuel costs will be covered if Cornwall based and the set is catered

How To Apply

Please send your headshot and showreel to the following email: assassinationfilm@gmail.com

Application Deadline: Saturday 13th September

The Roles

Zelda

Required for the full 10 days

Playing Age: early 30s to early 40sÔøΩ

Gender: FemaleÔøΩ

Accent: Neutral or regional as required

Zelda is an emotionally vulnerable yet guarded woman, shaped by the pain of a traumatic miscarriage and the breakdown of her marriage. She presents a sharp wit and a defiant streak, often appearing irritable and defensive. Beneath that, however, is a deep well of longing and emotional complexity. Though she's with a new partner, she remains unsettled‚Äîyearning for connection and hoping to find it in the possibility of a new, stable family.

Additional Notes:

A background in dance or movement is a plus. Actor must be comfortable portraying psychological nuance, emotional stillness, and layered internal shifts.

Thomas

Required for 6 of the 10 shooting dates (TBD)

Playing Age: 30's

Gender: Male

Accent: Neutral or regional as required

Thomas is a shamelessly self-serving man‚Äîcharming on the surface, but manipulative and cunning underneath. He uses his natural charisma to influence others and mask his true motives, though not as skillfully as he believes. His overconfidence often reveals the cracks in his carefully constructed facade, making his deceit more obvious than he intends.

items.title:
Statist/deltager i kortfilm/reklame s√∏ges.

Hej alle,

Til et projekt skal vi la‚Ä¶
items.summary:
Statist/deltager i kortfilm/reklame s√∏ges.

Hej alle,

Til et projekt skal vi lave en kortfilm der "r√¶kker tunge af corona".

Vi s√∏ger derfor nogle friske mennesker der vil deltage.

Vi s√∏ger to prim√¶r roller, en kvinde og en mand, begge voksne, dvs fra Ca 20 og opefter. Begge skal v√¶re √•bne og udadvendt og v√¶re velsoignerede. 
I filmen skal kvinden give manden et langt slik op af kinden, s√• dette skal man v√¶re klar p√•.
Bygning og udseende er der ikke som s√•dan krav til, bare man passer ind üòÄ

Vi skal ogs√• bruge en r√¶kke statister, b√•de b√∏rn voksne og √¶ldre. Igen er der ikke de store krav, bare man er frisk, √•ben og ikke bange for at v√¶re lidt fjollet.

Er stort plus for alle roller, er hvis man kan stikke tungen langt ud üòÄ

Optagelser foreg√•r i Aalborg, kbh og √•rhus og skydes efter den 6. Maj.

Et krav for deltagerne er l√∏bende corona tests inden optagelser starter, og dagligt hvis de tr√¶kker ud.

Send en besked hvis i har interesse, det forventes at der medsendes billede, samt en kort beskrivelse hvorfor man vil passe godt ind.

L√∏n aftales individuelt ved interesse. 

Mvh kasper

CASTING CALL 
St. James's Place x Sky Arts Idents

Are you an artist with a mentor or supporter you want to celebrate?

Raw Research Casting is looking for artists and makers from any artistic discipline (including visual arts, theatre, music, dance, design, crafts, and more) who would like to celebrate a mentor or supporter who made a real difference in their creative journey.

Whether it‚Äôs a teacher, friend, partner, parent, grandparent, sibling, or colleague - if someone gave you a pivotal piece of advice or support that helped shape your creative path, we want to hear from you.

Each short film (ident) will feature interviews with both the artist and their mentor / supporter, along with footage of the artist‚Äôs creative work or process. Crucially, will need the artists to supply photos or video clips that show their career development too.

Filming will take place in London for one day during the week of 21st July 2025.

Both the artist and their mentor/supporter will be paid for their time.

To apply or find out more, email casting@rawresearch.co.uk with the subject line ‚ÄúARTIST CASTING‚Äù.

items.title: I'm a film student and I was wondering if anyone would be interested in being in‚Ä¶
items.summary:
I'm a film student and I was wondering if anyone would be interested in being involved in my projects this year. I'm creating a trailer this term, a news segment next term, and a final movie at the end of the year. 

The trailer I'm working on right now is about the Welsh Princess Gwenllian Ferch Grufydd, the historical Hero Warrior from Deheubarth. I will supply all props and equipment for each project, and I even have a makeup artist on standby (my sister, she's a professional, worked on movies and in the west end). For this project I just need one girl or woman to play Gwenllian preparing for battle to take on the Norman army. 

I can't pay anyone who agrees to take part, I'm sorry, but I will provide copies of each final project to anyone who takes part so they can put it in their portfolios. I even have a photographer involved in taking photographs of you in your for your portfolios as well. 

If this is something you would be open to discussing you can reach me on here anytime, or on the email 49616@bridgend.ac.uk or [daniella.burgess@hotmail.co.uk](mailto:daniella.burgess@hotmail.co.uk).

I'm studying at Pencoed Campus Bridgend College, but we'll be travelling all over Wales for the shoots. 

Hope to hear from you, Dani.

items.title:
Hello, Hello! 

We are looking for actors to join SONDER, a new theatre collecti‚Ä¶
items.summary:
Hello, Hello! 

We are looking for actors to join SONDER, a new theatre collective, for our debut production: Toasted.

One in three people will face redundancy at some point in their lives. No job is safe from the shifting tides of modern work. Toasted delves into corporate negligence, where employees become numbers, and entire livelihoods are erased‚Äîlike an Excel spreadsheet‚Äîovernight.

We are collaborating with Hotel Continental ‚Äì Art Space in Exile, where we have access to rehearsal spaces and a professional performance venue.

We are looking for Actors of all backgrounds who are eager to explore bold, collaborative and impactful storytelling. This is an unpaid, collective-driven project, with the aim of forming an ensemble that will continue beyond this production.

Project Period: May ‚Äì June 2025

If you are interested in getting involved, then email us at info.sondertheatrecollective@gmail.com by 22.04 with a few lines about yourself and what you‚Äôd bring to the collective. We will follow up with audition dates, details, and more information about the production.

If you have any questions or are interested in assisting with the collective in other production roles, then please feel free to also get in touch.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

‚Äî The SONDER Team

Da vores kvindelige skuespiller, er blevet forhindret i at kunne v√¶re en del af holdet, s√∏ger vi en ny! 

Vi er et engageret hold, der dr√∏mmer om at filmen, kan kommer p√• film festival.

LIDT OM FILMEN
I en sommerferie der fyldt med venskab, k√¶rlighed, hemmelige forelskelser og skjulte f√∏lelser. F√∏lger man hovedpersonen Dagmar, og hendes venner Anna, Asger og Tobias.

Sammen beslutter de 4 venner sig for at tage p√• en spontan telttur ud p√• en √∏, hvor de laver b√•l, bader og s√¶tter telte op. Men efterh√•nden som turen skrider hen, begynder sm√• stykker i Dagmar og Annas venskab at smuldrer, mens Anna l√¶gger alt sin opm√¶rksomhed p√• Asger. Ser Tobias det som et free pass til Dagmar. Det hele eskalere hurtigere og hurtigere, og en drastisk beslutning bliver taget, som √¶ndre alt.

VI S√òGER:
1 dreng i spillealderen 17-20 til rollen ASGER
1 Pige i spillealderen 17-20 til rollen ANNA
                                  

ANNA                                                                                                                                                                 Er selvsikker p√• overfladen, men med en underliggende usikkerhed, som hun skjuler bag en h√•rd og til tider sarkastisk facade. Hun elsker at v√¶re i centrum, hun afl√¶se og manipulere andre. S√∏ger en form for tryghed hos Dagmar, samtidig med at hun bruger hende i hendes spil. Annas spil er for at fastholde opm√¶rksomhed, p√• sig selv. Hun er vild med Asger.

Ydre: Gerne langt h√•r, normal kropsbygning, ingen synlige tatoveringer.

ASGER:
Han er meget energisk ogs√• har han drengecharme. Han er en del af gruppens sociale kerne og nyder opm√¶rksomheden. Han har en afslappet holdning, men viser ogs√• sider af omsorg, is√¶r overfor Anna. Han kan v√¶re impulsiv og lidt uansvarlig.

Ydre: Normal kropsbygning, ingen synlige tatoveringer eller √∏reringe.

HVOR OG HVORN√ÖR
Optagelserne finder sted fra d 8-14 september i √òstjylland, omkring Aarhus omegnen. B√•de dag og nat optagelser. S√• man skal kunne i det tidsrum.

VIGTIG INFO
For begge karakterer vil der v√¶re scener hvor man har kysse scener og andre scener hvor man er if√∏rt badet√∏j, - det skal man v√¶re okay med.

Vi kan desv√¶rre ikke tilbyde l√∏n, men vi s√∏ger for transport, forplejning og rigtig godt hum√∏r.

items.summary:
Hi everyone,

We're producing a **paid social media campaign for Vantage Debt Management** as part of our **Trust is Earned and Broken in Every Step** series, which highlights real South African stories of overcoming debt and regaining financial control.

We're looking for **two male candidates** who have gone through debt and successfully recovered, ideally with experience using **Debt Review**, but this is not required:
1. **Male aged 25‚Äì44**
2. **Male aged 45+**

**What the shoot involves:**
* **Payment:** R2,000 per person
* **Date:** To be confirmed
* **Location:** Salt River, Cape Town
* **Format:** Short testimonial-style video (scripted) sharing your story of overcoming debt, plus a few headshots and b-roll footage.
* **Usage:** Videos will appear on Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, and other social media platforms.

This campaign aims to **humanise debt solutions**, show that recovery is possible, and encourage others to take control of their finances.

If you've successfully overcome debt and are comfortable sharing your story on camera, please **comment below or DM me** with:
* Your name
* Age
* Short summary of your debt recovery journey
* Contact number

We can't wait to help you share your story and inspire others.

items.title: Join our Dream Work Workshop, designed for actors, writers, directors, painters ‚Ä¶
items.summary:
Join our Dream Work Workshop, designed for actors, writers, directors, painters and artists ready to explore the unconscious landscape of their creativity. This transformative process moves beyond traditional technique, helping you access the raw, authentic parts of yourself to build more tender, complex, and grounded characters.

Through dream analysis, sense memory, and creative exploration, you will learn to: ‚Ä¢ Access the unconscious parts of yourself to better understand your roles. ‚Ä¢ Break through creative blocks, fear, and self-consciousness. ‚Ä¢ Own your part with a profound sense of truth and authenticity. ‚Ä¢ Use your entire lived experience‚Äîthe light and the shadow‚Äîto fuel your work from a place of strength.

This is is not about therapy; it‚Äôs about building a powerful, sustainable toolkit to deepen your craft and set your performances free.

Ready to transform your process? www.schott-acting-studio.de [learn more and secure your spot. ](https://lnkd.in/dbMkQvE)

unser Angebot war dir bisher zu teuer?
 
Oder du hattest keine Zeit oder Lust auf einen festen Fahrplan wie in unserem Coachingprogramm f√ºr den Schauspiel-Quereinstieg? 
 
Falls du es noch nicht mitbekommen hast:
 
Ich schlie√üe unser Coachingprogramm f√ºr immer, da ich zweifache Mama geworden bin und gebe jetzt unser gesamtes Casting-Know-how aus 15 Jahren harter Arbeit frei, zum einmaligen Angebots-Preis.
 
(Achtung: Nur jetzt f√ºr wenige Tage!) 
 
Du erh√§ltst: 
Unser komplettes Wissen aus 15 Jahren Schauspiel- und Casting-Erfahrung (Insider-Infos aus der Branche, in Video-Form) 
Konkrete Tools, Vorlagen und √úbungen f√ºr deinen Erfolg als Schauspieler, Komparse oder Darsteller (Listen mit Kontakten, Bewerbungsvorlagen, Netzwerk aus Showreel-Anbietern, Fotografen, Coaches usw.) 
Und das Beste: Du kannst alles in deinem Tempo anschauen und durcharbeiten, so schnell und so oft du willst. 
‚Äã
Stell dir vor; 
-Du hast keine Idee, was du in deine Casting-Bewerbung schreiben sollst?
Kein Problem: Du passt einfach unsere Vorlagen an
-Dir f√§llt es schwer deine Gagen zu verhandeln?

-Du bist unsicher wie das perfekte E-Casting aussieht? 
Kein Problem: Ab jetzt bist du Profi in allem!
 
Du erf√§hrst, wie du Caster √ºberzeugst, vor der Kamera begeisterst und Magie erzeugst und wie du nie wieder Angst vor Lampenfieber haben brauchst.
‚Äã
Da ist noch sooo viel anderes, was du lernen und bekommen wirst. Es ist einfach nicht genug Platz in diesem Post.
 
Also: Jetzt ist der beste Zeitpunkt f√ºr dich, um dir einen Vorsprung im Schauspiel-Markt zu verschaffen.  
 
Sichere dir jetzt das beste Angebot, das es jemals bei Castfinder gab (Achtung: nur bis zum 15.05. verf√ºgbar!)
‚Äã
Kommentiere schnell mit "‚ù§Ô∏è" und erhalte den Link mit allen weiteren Infos.

Wir freuen uns riesig auf dich. 
Deine Sarah & das Castfinder-Team

items.title:
Bonjour,

dans le cadre d‚Äôun projet ambitieux (sc√©nario de 60minutes adapt√© en 6‚Ä¶
items.summary:
Bonjour,

dans le cadre d‚Äôun projet ambitieux (sc√©nario de 60minutes adapt√© en 60 √©pisodes d‚Äô1 minute pour TikTok), nous cherchons nos **deux r√¥les masculins principaux**. Nous recherchons sp√©cifiquement des acteurs **parlant couramment l‚Äôanglais ou l‚Äôanglais am√©ricain, sans accent √©tranger**.

**Les th√®mes abord√©s** : Amours masculin, Mafia, Manipulation, Quand l‚Äôamour et la haine s‚Äôentrem√™lent

**Les personnages** :

1. Mitchell Un membre de haut rang du Bloodhand Gang, Mitchell est une figure rus√©e et r√©siliente de la mafia. Connu pour son style de vie d√©cadent et imprudent, il est souvent appel√© ¬´ le playboy du Bloodhand Gang ¬ª. Venant des bidonvilles, Mitchell a une soif insatiable de pouvoir et est pr√™t √† endurer la calomnie ‚Äî certains l'accusent de vendre son corps pour gravir les √©chelons.

2. Julian

Personnage √©corch√© vif, son enfance fut tragique et tumultueuse, marqu√©e par de constantes √©preuves. H√©ritier naturel du Bloodhand Gang, il est pr√©par√© par son demi-fr√®re √† en prendre les r√™nes. Pourtant, au fond de lui, sa seule raison de rester dans le Gang est d'√™tre proche de celui qu‚Äôil consid√®re comme son sauveur, Mitchell.

**Informations pratiques** :

Production : KAPTUR FILM

P√©riode de tournage : Entre mars et mai 2025 proche Paris (75)

R√©mun√©ration : Tarifs conventionnels.

Exigences : Photos r√©centes, d√©mo ou auto-tape (facultatif : vid√©o d‚Äôintroduction).

Contact : Veuillez envoyer vos candidatures √† kapturfilmcasting@gmail.com

Nous avons h√¢te de d√©couvrir vos talents et de collaborer √† ce merveilleux projet !

****************

Hello, As part of an ambitious project (60-minute script adapted into 60 1-minute episodes for TikTok), we are looking for our **two main male roles**. We are specifically looking for actors who are** fluent in English or American English, with no foreign accents**.

**The themes covered** : Male love, Mafia, Manipulation, When love and hate intertwine

**The characters** :

Mitchell A high-ranking member of the Bloodhand Gang, Mitchell is a cunning and resilient figure in the mafia. Known for his decadent and reckless lifestyle, he is often referred to as "the playboy of the Bloodhand Gang." Coming from the slums, Mitchell has an insatiable thirst for power and is willing to endure slander‚Äîsome even accuse him of selling his body to climb the ranks.

Julian A tortured soul, his childhood was tragic and tumultuous, marked by constant hardships. The natural heir to the Bloodhand Gang, he is groomed by his half-brother to take commands. Yet, deep down, his only reason for staying in the Gang is to be close to the one he considers his savior, Mitchell.

**Practical Informations** :

Production : KAPTUR FILM

Shooting period: Between march and may 2025 near Paris (75)

Compensation: Provided according to standard rates.

Requirements: Recent photos, demo reel, or self-tape (optional: introduction video).

Contact: Please send your applications to kapturfilmcasting@gmail.com

We look forward to discovering your talents and collaborating on this wonderful project!

Chris Fung - Singing Teacher

items.title: For a commercial filming in Paris with a well established French production comp‚Ä¶
items.summary:
For a commercial filming in Paris with a well established French production company and amazing director on the 13th September French casting director Rachel Desmarest is looking for English speaking children aged 5 - 9 years old, from all backgrounds and ethnicities based in France and UK. We are looking to create two "duos" that know each other (so each child has a friend they know on the shoot) - this can be brothers, sisters, friends, cousins, neighbours.. No need for prior experience, this is a perfect first experience for children and a good introduction to the film industry. It's a very fun project they will be able to share as a duo, and the director is really great with children. There is a good budget which is tailored to the requirements of French law and practice concerning children and transport, hotel, chaperone and meals will be provided for children who live far from Paris.

If your child / children are available for shoot on the 13th September and wish to participate, please send in headshot and a short presentation video explaining (in English) why he / she would like to take part in a commercial along with contact details for parents asap and by the latest midnight on Saturday 6th september to the following email :

racheldesmarestcastingbox@gmail.com

‚Ä¶
items.summary:
Ich suche f√ºr eine Theaterproduktion
Arbeitstitel: Wir sehen uns im Herbstwind.
Wen: Regisseur + Autor (Konzept/Script)

Was: Theater Soloproduktion (Mit M√∂glichkeit von 2-3 Personen St√ºck)
Wo: Geplant Hamburg -> m√∂glich Tour?

Kurze Ideenvorstellung: 
Hallo liebe Kunstschaffende. Ich bin auf der Suche nach jemandem, der mich in Sachen Konzept, Script und Regie unterst√ºtzen w√ºrde.
Von der Idee soll es um folgendes gehen. 
Ich m√∂chte die Geschichte der Titanic aus der Sicht von Thomas Andrews erz√§hlen. Ich besch√§ftige mich schon l√§nger mit diesem Menschen und finde vieles spannend, wie hat er all das erlebt? Besonders der innere Konflikt, gepaart mit dem Wahnsinn der Zeit und dem schnellen Fortschritt. 

Au√üerdem m√∂chte ich 2-3 Lieder aus dem Titanic Musical ebenfalls verwenden. Unter anderem: In every age, Autum, Andrew's vision. 

zu mir: Ich selbst bin ausgebildeter Schauspieler/Sprecher, mit hoher Gesang Affinit√§t, aber keinerlei Musical Erfahrung, deshalb m√∂chte ich es in einem eigenen Projekt gerne mit einbauen. 

F√ºr mehr Details uns Anfragen gerne √ºber FB PN, oder direkt eine E-Mail jamesbleyer@mail.de

Jeg caster lige nu skuespillere til et nyt video-v√¶rk, skabt af en internationalt anerkendt kunstnerduo, med base i Los Angeles.

**ROLLER:**

De skal alle skal spille medlemmer af et drengekor.

*(non-bin√¶re, transk√∏nnede samt androgynt udseende ogs√• velkomne). *
*(Ligeledes er du ogs√• stadig velkommen til at ans√∏ge hvis du er 18-19 √•r, men ser meget ung ud. uden sk√¶gstubbe osv.)*

**DETALJER:**

Deres arbejde unders√∏ger temaer som identitetskonstruktion, magtforhold og digitale avatarer og de arbejder i krydsfeltet mellem kunst, kultur, musik, mode og reklame.

**PRAKTISK INFO**

**MENNESKER P√Ö JORDEN 
**Performancekunst - deltagere s√∏ges.
Som tak for din deltagelse vil du modtage en kompensation i form af et gavekort p√• **500 kr**. til en lokal butik, cafe eller restaurant (N√∏rrebro, Bl√•g√•rdsgade)

**6 pladser tilbage!**

Kunstner Molly Haslund har brug for din hj√¶lp! Hvis du bor, arbejder eller f√¶rdes p√• N√∏rrebro og er god til at ligge ned og hvile, er det lige pr√¶cis dig, hun har brug for.
 
Molly er ved at forberede sit nye v√¶rk **MENNESKER P√Ö JORDEN**, og til det form√•l har hun ‚Äì naturligvis ‚Äì brug for 22 mennesker, som ligger p√• jorden. 

Molly siger:
 *‚Äò‚ÄôVi skal sammen fors√∏ge at fastholde et billede af 22 mennesker, som ligger stille p√• Bl√•g√•rds Plads. Vi f√∏lger et s√¶t enkle instruktioner. Det betyder, at man som deltager kan blive udskiftet og f√• pauser undervejs. Det lyder m√•ske absurd, men det kunstneriske eksperiment er at unders√∏ge samspillet mellem det fastfrosne billede og den sociale, levende krop‚Ä¶ hvis s√•dan en findes. Vi bliver n√∏dt til at pr√∏ve det!‚Äô‚Äô*

Molly Haslund er billedkunstner. **MENNESKER P√Ö JORDEN** laver hun p√• Bl√•g√•rds Plads, der ogs√• er det omr√•de af byen, hvor hun til daglig f√¶rdes og arbejder p√• sit atelier: [www.mollyhaslund.com](http://www.mollyhaslund.com/)
V√¶rket skabes i samarbejde med Metropolis: 
[www.metropolis.dk](http://www.metropolis.dk/)

**HVAD KR√ÜVER DET?
 **Det kr√¶ver ingen s√¶rlige foruds√¶tninger at v√¶re med - udover nysgerrighed, mod og din fulde tilstedev√¶relse. Vi finder en l√∏sning p√• eventuelt individuelle behov.

Hvis du er interesseret og vil h√∏re mere, send en mail til Molly og kom forbi til det sidste introm√∏de** s√∏ndag den 28. august klokken 11.00 -12.00** p√• Bl√•g√•rds Plads. Her vil Molly uddybe konceptet og instruktionerne til den stille aktion. Molly printer og medbringer kontrakter, som kan udfyldes til m√∏det. (eller efter aftale hvis s√∏ndag ikke fungerer)
 
Hvis du IKKE kan den dag, er det muligt at kontakte Molly og lave en aftale om et andet introm√∏de INDEN den 28. hvor vi skal have deltagerlisten p√• plads.

**Molly:** 27286149 / [molly@mollyhaslund.com](mailto:molly@mollyhaslund.com)
 
Som tak for din deltagelse vil du modtage en kompensation i form af et gavekort p√• **500 kr**. til en lokal butik, cafe eller restaurant ‚Äì som udleveres d. 3. september. 
 
**HUSK: V√¶rket opf√∏res den 3. september 13.00-16.00, og vi m√∏des 12.00**

To kunstnere inviteres til at tegne det hele. Tegningerne vil efterf√∏lgende blive udstillet n√¶r Bl√•g√•rds Plads. Der vil ogs√• v√¶re en fotograf til stede som tager billeder og videodokumenterer p√• afstand (ikke close-ups)

items.title:
Casting Call for Short Film ‚Äì ‚ÄúDisplaced‚Äù

Production Type: Short Film (Indie, n‚Ä¶
items.summary:
Casting Call for Short Film ‚Äì ‚ÄúDisplaced‚Äù

Production Type: Short Film (Indie, non-union, low-budget)
Location: Tulsa Metro, 
Oklahoma
Dates: Weekends in October 2025
Compensation: $100/day (no days over 8 hours)
Director: Raphael Pacheco

Synopsis:  In a labyrinthine urban sprawl, a lonely detective struggles to solve a murder while grappling with the disorientation of life in a new time and place. As he follows the trail of a vague suspect, his investigation descends into a dark odyssey of anxiety and madness. 

Casting Roles
The Detective ‚Äì Male Lead, 20s‚Äì30s. Tough and gritty exterior, but inwardly sensitive and sorrowful. Brief action violence scene (experience preferred but not required).
The Chief ‚Äì Male Supporting, 40s‚Äì60s. Hardened but friendly, a respectable figure.
Irons ‚Äì Male Supporting, 20s‚Äì40s. A blunt, opinionated officer partnered with the Detective.
The Fatale ‚Äì Female Supporting, 30s. Mature, dignified, but manipulative. Scene requires shuffling cards (experience preferred but not required).
The Siren ‚Äì Female Supporting, 20s. Young companion to the Fatale, charming but irreverent.

To Submit
Email contact@pachecoprojects.com with the subject line: Displaced Audition ‚Äì [Desired Role]

Include:

Full Name (as you wish to be credited)

Age

Height

Relevant Special Skills (see preferences in role breakdowns)

Attach or link:

Resume

Headshot

Dramatic Monologue (self-tape, max 60 seconds)

Submission Deadline: September 13, 2025 (end of day).
Callbacks with script sides may be requested after that date.

Displaced is an abstract, black-and-white neo-noir in the tradition of surrealist cinema like David Lynch‚Äôs Eraserhead, Orson Welles‚Äô The Trial, or Charlie Kaufman‚Äôs I‚Äôm Thinking of Ending Things. If those films feel too weird or avant garde, this probably isn‚Äôt for you (and that‚Äôs okay!). Displaced is written and directed by Raphael Pacheco, a seasoned producer of indie shorts and web series, in his first film since moving to Oklahoma. It will be a minimalistic production, with a small and versatile crew, shooting on a prosumer mirrorless camera, and the cast providing their own outfits (with exceptions for specialty costume/prop pieces required by the script). Expect a tight, intimate set with lots of creative and scrappy problem solving.

items.title:
The 4%: The Key to Your Acting Journey üé≠‚ú®
 
 Today I want to talk about a conce‚Ä¶
items.summary:
The 4%: The Key to Your Acting Journey üé≠‚ú®
 
 Today I want to talk about a concept that affects everyone on the planet but especially actors
 
 It‚Äôs actually a pretty startling statistic and a powerful concept, and it could literally redefine your acting journey
 
 Did you know that a staggering 96% of actors quit and change careers within the first four years of entering the industry
 
 It‚Äôs true
 
 Leaving only 4% who actually persevere and eventually find success
 
 When I first found this out, it left me with two immediate questions
 
 Why is this
 
 What sets the 96% apart from the 4%
 
 After a lot of study, my belief is
 
 It all comes down to a concept called "The Dip"
 
 What‚Äôs The Dip
 
 "The Dip" is something we all encounter in our careers‚Äîespecially in acting
 
 It‚Äôs that moment when the initial excitement fades, and the reality of hard work, rejection, and competition sets in
 
 This is the make-or-break point, where enthusiasm wanes, and most people question their path
 
 The 96% give in to these doubts and challenges, but
 
 The remaining 4% push through
 
 So, what makes these few different üî•
 
 It‚Äôs their unyielding determination and resilience
 
 While others see obstacles, they see opportunities
 
 They work tirelessly‚Äîearly mornings, late nights, holidays
 
 These are the actors who practice even when they‚Äôre ill, tired, stressed, or busy
 
 They don‚Äôt let today‚Äôs negativity delay tomorrow‚Äôs dreams
 
 Here‚Äôs the good news
 
 Being part of that 4% is a choice
 
 It‚Äôs about deciding not to quit when it gets tough
 
 It‚Äôs about embracing "The Dip" as a part of your journey, instead of the end of it
 
 Because on the other side of perseverance
 
 Lies your success, your fulfillment, and the complete realization of your dreams
 
 It‚Äôs not just about becoming a great actor
 
 It‚Äôs about becoming a relentless pursuer of goals
 
 Embracing the journey and being a warrior against adversity
 
 So, to every actor reading this
 
 Ask yourself
 
 Are you ready to be part of the 4%
 
 Are you willing to be part of the 4%
 
 Are you prepared to push through "The Dip" to achieve your dreams
 
 If your answer is yes, then gear up for a journey of a lifetime‚Äîfilled with growth, challenges, and triumphs
 
 And remember
 
 When it gets hard‚Äîand it will‚Äîremember that it will be worth it
 
 So stay strong, stay dedicated, and go transform those dreams into reality üí™
 
 #ActingJourney #TheDip #Perseverance #DreamBig #ActorMindset #MasterYourCraft #MasterYourMind #MasterYourBusiness #StayStrong #ActorLife #NeverGiveUp #ActorsLife #PursueYourPassion #Resilience #ChaseYourDreams

items.title:
In den letzten 3 Jahren habe ich etwas so Krasses kreiert. 
‚Äã
Ich habe mir die b‚Ä¶
items.summary:
In den letzten 3 Jahren habe ich etwas so Krasses kreiert. 
‚Äã
Ich habe mir die besten Schauspielcoaches, Mindsetcoaches, Fotografen und Filmemacher gepackt, die ich kenne. 
‚Äã
Gemeinsam haben wir Quereinsteiger erfolgreich in die Schauspielbranche gebracht. 
‚Äã
Wir haben die Branche und den Weg in diese nachhaltig ver√§ndert. 
‚Äã
Mittlerweile ist der Quereinstieg ein anerkannter Weg ins Schauspiel, was nicht immer so war. 
‚Äã
Schlaflose N√§chte.
Tr√§nen der Freude und Verbundenheit
unz√§hlige Menschen, deren Leben sich ver√§ndert hat. 
Es war einfach krass. 
Intensiv.
Atemberaubend. 
‚Äã
Deswegen ist es nicht leicht zu gehen. 
‚Äã
Aber es ist an der Zeit. 
‚Äã
Mein Team und ich stecken ein allerletztes Mal all unsere Energie in eine Gruppe von motivierten Menschen. 
‚Äã
Egal, wie alt, woher, welche Vorerfahrung. 
‚Äã
Hauptsache die richtige Energie, Motivation, Power. 
‚Äã
Wir suchen noch einmal Menschen, die ihren Traum leben m√∂chten, um sie in nur 6 Monaten in die Branche zu begleiten. 
‚Äã
F√ºhlst du den Ruf? 
‚Äã
Dann bewirb dich auf einen der streng limitierten Pl√§tze f√ºr ein Strategiegespr√§ch mit einer unserer Coaches. 
‚Äã
Wir melden uns telefonisch, um zu checken, ob das Gespr√§ch Sinn macht. 
‚Äã
Und wenn ja, schmieden wir gemeinsam, kostenlos, deinen Fahrplan und entscheiden, ob wir den Weg gemeinsam gehen. 
‚Äã
Wir freuen uns auf eine kleine Gruppe mit besonderen Menschen. 
‚Äã
Es wird legend√§r ;-) 
‚Äã
Deine Sarah & das Castfinder-Team 
‚Äã
PS: Jobangebote findest du √ºbrigens hier:
https://www.facebook.com/groups/castfinder.de
Und hier Jobangebote sowie Casting- und Schauspieltipps: https://www.instagram.com/castfinder_casting_coaching/

items.title: My name is Adelola Mary Haastrup, and I‚Äôm a passionate actress currently based i‚Ä¶
items.summary:
My name is Adelola Mary Haastrup, and I‚Äôm a passionate actress currently based in Nigeria. I‚Äôm looking to expand my career in the UK and am actively seeking opportunities for visa sponsorship.

I started acting at the age of 7, performing in stage productions. While much of my early work was in gospel theater, I‚Äôm not particularly religious, and my focus has always been on the craft of acting. I‚Äôm eager to explore a wide range of roles in film, TV, theater, and commercial work, and I‚Äôm excited to branch out into new genres and experiences.

In addition to my acting experience, I studied Music Technology with a major in Stage Performing Arts for 2 years , and I have full documentation of all my final projects from that time. This technical training complements my stage performance and has given me a comprehensive understanding of both the artistic and technical sides of the industry.

I was also part of a gospel drama group form 2011 to 2020 , where I won 4 "Card Awards," including Best Actress  (twice), Best Dressed, and Best Minister. These awards reflect my dedication to the craft, and I‚Äôm incredibly proud of them.

I‚Äôm looking forward to collaborating on a wide range of acting roles in the UK‚Äôs vibrant and inclusive creative industry, and I‚Äôm actively seeking potential employers who are willing to support visa sponsorships for skilled performers like me.

If you have any leads or know of any production companies, agents, or casting opportunities, I would love to hear from you! Please feel free to DM me or comment below.

Thank you so much for your time and consideration. I look forward to connecting with you all!

Veteos, a local veterinary video production company, is looking for pets for three specific scenes for social media clips for a veterinary financial company. We will be filming within the next month or so in Denver. W9 and signed release required. All scenes are about 2-3 hours of filming. The roles are below:

**Small Dog for a Spa Day** - ($300) Small dog and their pet parent enjoying a spa day. Pup must be able to lie still with a towel over them and on their head with some accessories (see example photo) to show the ultimate puppy spa day! To be considered, please send a video of your small dog lying in a similar position for 5-10 seconds to me via Facebook messenger. 

**Stuffed Animal Lover Dog** - ($300) Dog who LOVES stuffed animals - any stuffed animal! In this scene, we will be making a stuffy "come to life" with a life-size costume of a provided stuffy. Dog must love any and all stuffies, *even if new to them*. To be considered, please send a video of your dog loving their stuffed animals to me via Facebook messenger. 

**Cat Chasing Laser Pointer** - ($300) Cat who can easily follow and loves playing with a laser pointer with their pet parent. Filming location may be rented home or pet parents home depending on the cat's preference and comfort level.To be considered, please send in a video of your cat actively chasing a laser pointer to me via Facebook messenger. 

I can't wait to see your submission!

items.title:
Project: LITTLE HOUSE ON THE PRAIRIE
Studio/Network: CBS STUDIOS / AC STUDIO / N‚Ä¶
items.summary:
Project: LITTLE HOUSE ON THE PRAIRIE
Studio/Network: CBS STUDIOS / AC STUDIO / NETFLIX
Casting Director: Rachel Tenner
Showrunner/Exec. Producer: Rebecca Sonnenshine (The Boys, Vampire Diaries, Archive 81)
Exec. Producers: Joy Gorman Wettels for Joy Coalition, Trip Friendly for Friendly Family Productions & Dana Fox 
Director: Sarah Adina Smith
Shooting Location: Winnipeg, Canada
Shoot Dates: Approximately June to October 2025. Candidates must be able to be exclusively available for the entire period.
Submission Deadline: April 4th

Introduction: Based on the iconic book series written by Laura Ingalls Wilder, Netflix‚Äôs Little House on the Prairie is an epic and thrilling family adventure of the mythic American West. Since its original publication in the 1930s, the LITTLE HOUSE book series and brand has remained a constant in the global zeitgeist. The classic novels have sold over 73 million copies in more than 100 countries, translated into at least 27 languages.

Project Synopsis: Part hopeful family drama, part epic survival tale, and part origin story of the American West, this fresh adaptation of Laura Ingalls Wilder‚Äôs iconic semi-autobiographical Little House books offers a kaleidoscopic view of the struggles and triumphs of those who shaped the frontier.

Submission Instructions: 
1. Intro - Say your Name, Age, Height & Location (where you live) to the camera. Then zoom out to a full body shot. PLEASE put the intro in its own file. We do NOT want the intro on the same file as the scenes. Please label each audition file by Scene Number (S1, S2). Please submit only one take of each scene. 

2. Lighting & Sound - Please ensure that your face is well lit and that the external microphone is close enough to clearly understand what you are saying in the audition.

3. Framing & Taping - Please frame the shot from the top of head to mid chest. Please place the camera/phone somewhere stable like a tripod or a flat surface. If you are taping with a smart phone, please turn it horizontally. Do not do the scene directly to camera, but rather focus on the person reading the scene with you.  That reader should stand next to the camera.

4. Takes & Scenes - Please have another person read the other characters lines off-screen and stand next to the camera.  (please do not read the stage directions).

We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity. For every role, please submit qualified performers, without regard to disability, race, age, color, national origin, ethnic origin, sexual orientation, gender identity or any other basis prohibited by law. The persons and events depicted in this casting breakdown are fictitious. Any similarity to actual persons or events is unintentional.
Role(s): Download Sides: 

LAURA INGALLS
Character is a white Female, 9-11 years old. Laura is a disruptor. Honest to a fault. Questions authority. She is observant, tender more... strong-willed, hot-tempered. She resists the bounds of 19th-century ladylike behavior ‚Äî she likes to hunt and run barefoot and feel the sun on her face. She is curious and optimistic and fearless and is quick to confront anyone who is cruel or unjust. She loves fiercely and unapologetically and is utterly devoted to her dog, Jack. She absorbs every detail she sees around her, collecting them for stories she will someday share with the world. SERIES REGULAR less...

items.summary:
Casting Call: *Fossilized*

Drama short film

Filming around Denver, Colorado in fall 2025

Unpaid, nonunion‚Äì food and transportation will be provided.

Log line: When a young paleontologist‚Äôs grandmother begins to forget who she is, she runs away to search for proof of her past.

Roles:

Linnie: female, 7-11 years old; Linnie is a responsible 8 year old with a passion for paleontology who lives with her grandmother.

There is a two-year time difference between flashback sequences and the main timeline of the film‚Äì ideally, actresses auditioning should be able to pass for both 8-9 years old and 6-7 years old when styled differently.

Nana: female, 60-70 years old; Nana is Linnie's grandmother and guardian. When Linnie was placed in her care, she was a loving and capable guardian, but she has started to show signs of dementia.

Sophie: female, 7-11 years old; a high energy nine year old, Sophie is Linnie's best friend and loudest supporter.

Mr. Jake: male, 28-35 years old; A kind elementary school teacher who tries his best to look out for his stepdaughter Sophie and her best friend Linnie.

To audition, please apply through our Backstage page or send a self-tape to *Arthurr1904s@gmail.com* using the sides provided below.

Der Film Josie erz√§hlt vom bewegenden Leben einer jungen Frau namens Josie, die aus schwierigen Familien Verh√§ltnissen stammt. Tags√ºber arbeitet sie als Reinigungskraft, nachts schreibt sie leidenschaftlich an ihren eigenen Songs ‚Äì denn ihr gro√üer Traum ist es, als S√§ngerin ber√ºhmt zu werden.

Am emotionalen H√∂hepunkt steht Josie vor der schwersten Entscheidung ihres Lebens ‚Äì und zeigt schlie√ülich auf der B√ºhne ihr wahres Talent.

**Please see below my work as a Creative Director/Editor so you can have an idea of my aesthetic.**

**Roles:**
* **Lo√Øe (22-30yo)**: Woman, trained dancer who can act. Lo√Øe Fuller, groundbreaking performer and innovator. (Romantic lead, dance performance role, non speaking role).

* **Gab Sor√®re (22-28yo)**: Butch/masc-presenting woman or Non-Binary. Can fake a French accent or French-speaking (not essential, coaching available). Gab is Lo√Øe‚Äôs romantic partner. (Romantic lead).

* **Eileen Gray (Young, 22-28yo)**: Woman, MUST BE Irish. Iconic interior designer and close friend to the couple.

* **Eileen Gray (Older, over 60)**: Elderly version of Eileen reflecting back on her friends‚Äô story in a later interview.

* **The technician (18-30): A man (non speaking role)**

Hey everyone! I‚Äôm shooting my graduation film this August in Berlin, and we‚Äôre looking for a visually striking and unique actor to play the lead role:

üïä THE ANGEL

üìç Location: Berlin

üìÖ Shooting: August 2025

üí∂ This is a paid project ‚Äì unfortunately not a huge budget, but we are able to offer modest payment + expenses + meals, and of course, professional footage for your showreel.

About the film:

Trust Your Angels is a surreal dark comedy set in a claustrophobic office restroom, where a nervous young woman, minutes away from a life-changing interview, meets... an angel... or maybe just a giant, dressed-up guy.

It‚Äôs weird, emotional, funny ‚Äî and ends with a totally unexpected twist that flips everything on its head.

üëÄ We‚Äôre casting:

üïä ANGEL ‚Äì Male

An interesting and memorable appearance.

We're looking for someone who feels extraordinary‚Äîphysically or energetically. Could be mysterious, slightly bizarre, serene, intense, or all of the above.

Height over 190cm is a bonus, but not a must.

We will consider every application. If you feel like you don‚Äôt ‚Äúfit the mold,‚Äù that‚Äôs probably a good thing.

üì© To apply:

**Hej alle,**

Vi er et Masterclass hold fra Potemkin Den Jyske Filmskole, som n‚Ä¶
items.summary:
**Hej alle,**

Vi er et Masterclass hold fra Potemkin Den Jyske Filmskole, som netop er i gang med et fedt projekt hvor vi s√∏ger skuespillere. 

**Logline:**
En h√•befuld men forbig√•et filminstrukt√∏r f√•r muligheden i en branche styret af sequels og profit ‚Äì og m√• v√¶lge mellem at g√• p√• kompromis med sine v√¶rdier, eller en karriere.

**Karakterer:**
* **Instrukt√∏r:** Uddannet gennem filmskolen, og har haft et par √•r til at opleve tilv√¶relsen som ung instrukt√∏r. Han lever fuldt ud i sin id√© om at v√¶re kunstnerisk, men m√• se sig tilfreds med freelancing jobs. St√•lfast i sine principper om, at film er kunst og ikke til for, at studio executives kan k√∏be nye b√•de og biler.
* **Miranda: **Har hyret instrukt√∏ren til at filme for sin OnlyFans. √ònsker at lave sm√• forhistorier til sine videoer, men synes instrukt√∏rens historie er for karikeret. Da instrukt√∏ren forlanger at se k√¶rlighed mellem spillerne, foresl√•r hun at han laver Titanic 2.
* **Valentin:** Prim√¶rt vulg√¶r og primitiv. Han t√¶nker kun p√• sex og er ligeglad med instrukt√∏rens kunstneriske ambitioner.
* **Produceren:** Rationel og fornuftig. Bekendt af instrukt√∏ren gennem Den Danske Filmskole. Holder benene p√• jorden og pr√∏ver at styre forventningerne.
* **CFO‚Äôen: **CEO‚Äôens taler√∏r, g√∏r alt i den rette √•nd for selskabet og for at maksimere profit.
* **CEO‚Äôen:** Har magten over filmselskabet. Siger ingenting, lader sin CFO tale, medmindre den endelige beslutning skal tages.

**Dynamik:**
En selvh√∏jtidelig instrukt√∏r insisterer p√• at v√¶re en stor kunstner ‚Äì selv midt i et amat√∏r-porno-setup. Samtidig m√∏der han en kynisk filmbranche, der kun t√¶nker p√• superhelte og at s√¶lge biografbilletter. Midt i al galskaben bliver en tilf√¶ldig joke fra pornoskuespillerinden om *Titanic 2* pludselig instrukt√∏rens uventede vej til succes.

**Optagelserne finder sted 9, 10 og 11 september i √Örhus. **

**Rollerne er ul√∏nnet. **Men der vil v√¶re forplejninger, og rig mulighed for at styrke sin showreel.

**Casting** afholdes i √Örhus C **tirsdag d. 2. sep fra 9-15. **

Hvis det lyder som noget for dig, s√• send evt en introduktionsvideo og showreel (hvis du har) til sara774g@gmail.com - og gerne hvilken rolle du t√¶nker, passer bedst til dig. S√• sender vi manus.

Vi gl√¶der os til at h√∏re fra dig!

De bedste hilsner, Simon, Sara, Frida og Melanie

## **CASTING: Junger arabischer Schauspieler f√ºr den n√§chsten Film eines preisgekr√∂nten Regisseurs gesucht.**

 

Anika Films sucht einen leidenschaftlichen und talentierten arabischsprachigen Schauspieler f√ºr die Hauptrolle in einem Film, der im September in Berlin gedreht wird. Dieses aufregende Projekt zeichnet sich durch eine unglaubliche Erz√§hlweise, kulturelle Tiefe und charakterstarkes Drama aus.

 

Voraussetzungen:

 Flie√üende Arabischkenntnisse (Muttersprache oder flie√üend)

 Starkes schauspielerisches Talent mit nachgewiesenen √ºberzeugenden Leistungen

 Film-, Fernseh- oder Theatererfahrung von Vorteil, aber nicht Bedingung

Good mornin @everyone 

"Every audition you walk into isn‚Äôt just a chance to be chosen, it‚Äôs a chance to practise being unforgettable." 

‚Äî Casting Calls UK

Think about it, not every role will be yours, and that‚Äôs perfectly fine. What matters is how you show up. Each audition is rehearsal for the next, each self-tape a step toward mastery. If you leave a mark, whether through energy, professionalism, or presence, then you‚Äôve already won. Casting directors remember the ones who light up the room, even if the role goes to someone else. items.summary:
**Hello,**

**We are looking for actors for the shooting of a short movie we will be filming at Trebas.**

**Here is the information :**

**Production title**: A Killer on the Run

**Unionized / Non-unionized**: Non-unionized

**Production Type**: Student

**Project duration**: Short film (10 minutes)

**Production company: **Trebas Institute

**Director: **Daniel Langlois Houle

**Casting director: Jean-Philippe L√©vesque**

**Location of the hearing: **550 Sherbrooke West

**Location of the filming **: Montreal

**Courriel** : dave198816@icloud.com

**Compensation **: Non

**Auditions **: 11-25-2024 / 11-26-2023

**Start of filming** : 15-01-2024

**End of filming: **16-01-2024

**Synopsis**

One Saturday morning, the charismatic and seductive Math√©o, graduating from the Shivers Film Institute, auditions to produce his script with Ben Sirois, a renowned producer. The meeting quickly takes a dramatic turn and becomes a matter of life and death for the two men. Who will survive the hearing? It's up to you to find out!

**Character descriptions**

MATH√âO: 30 YEARS OLD, GRADUATING AT THE SHIVERS CINEMA INSTITUTE. ATTRACTIVE AND VERY CHARMING, HE WANTS TO BECOME A DIRECTOR AND SCREENWRITER. THROUGH HIS MUSCULAR APPEARANCE AND THE IMPRESSION OF HAVING EVERYTHING GOING FOR HIM, HE IS READY TO MAKE THE NECESSARY EFFORTS TO MAKE HIS DREAMS COME TRUE.

BEN SIROIS: 40 YEARS OLD AND RENOWNED PRODUCER IN THE FILM INDUSTRY. IT IS VICIOUS AND INAPPROPRIATE. ONE LOOK AT HIM IS ENOUGH TO UNDERSTAND THAT HE IS FULL OF BAD INTENTIONS AND THAT HE IS READY TO DO ANYTHING TO ACHIEVE HIS ENDS.

GEORGE: 50 YEARS OLD AND JANITOR AT THE SHIVERS INSTITUTE. HE IS POLITE, SYMPHATIC AND HELPFUL. HE IS A MAN OF SIMPLE APPEARANCE AND WITHOUT HISTORY.

**Thanks in advance for the answer. We await it with enthusiasm.**

**Sincerely,**

**JP L√©vesque**

items.summary:
Casting Call! Warrington/Manchester area, late October/early November filming dates

We are looking for one Female and one Male actor to play the lead roles in our upcoming short film, ‚ÄòOh, Death‚Äô, a comedy drama exploring themes of choice, family, death and morality. Synopsis below;

After his abrupt and unexpected death, Peter is almost elated to be greeted by an Agent of Death and to discover that there is an afterlife. Peter believes he‚Äôs done enough good to earn his ticket Up, but when sarcastic and bored Margo tells him he‚Äôs going Down, Peter has only a short time to convince her to change her mind to avoid an eternity of punishment.

The Roles-

Peter- 
Male
Age- 35-45

Personality- Selfish, uncaring, wants to be good but rarely musters up the effort to do so

Requirements for the role-Willing to learn a few Gaelic phrases

Margo- 
Female
Age- 30-40

Personality- Sarcastic, funny, rude, nonchalant yet an imposing figure

Requirements for the role- Willing to learn a few Gaelic phrases

Due to the limited budget of our film, roles are unpaid but we will cover the cost of travel and provide/pay for food and drink. Filming will take place in Warrington/Manchester area, filming dates are;

Saturday 25th October
Friday 7th November
Saturday 8th November

If you‚Äôre interested, we‚Äôd love to hear from you! 

Send an email to deadhorsestudios2025@gmail.com stating which character you‚Äôd like to play and a link to your showreel if you have one! Shortlisted actors will be given more character information and will be asked to record a self tape of one of the scenes before we make our final decision.

You can visit our YouTube or Instagram page, Dead Horse Studios, to check out a little of what we‚Äôre about, including our latest short film, ‚ÄòThe Block‚Äô that was entered into the Cannes Film Festival earlier this year.

We can‚Äôt wait to hear from you,
Andrew and the rest of the Dead Horse Studios crew.

items.summary: Question for Americans who have acted in the UK:  I am being required to get Public Liability Insurance.  This seems to be an easy thing to get for UK citizens. **Compensation:** None but free lunch & gas

***SECOND:***

**Title:** The Baseball Bat

**Genre: **Comedic Thriller

**Logline**: Jake has tools to manage his anxiety now. But he comes across his biggest hurdle yet: chaperoning a group of detention students who learn that faking a concussion can get them out of class early. Will this prove to be too much for him or will he finally resolve a worry on his own? 

**Roles:** Students, ages 7-14. All genders and ethnicities. You'll be extras but you'll be able to improvise your own lines!

**Shooting date**: Unknown, because we still have to find a school that'd be willing to let me film there, but hopefully some time in October or November, most likely soon after school gets let out on a weekday. Only one day. 

**Shooting location**: Also unknown, but definitely a school of some sort either in the Denver or Aurora area. 

Kindly email me at jakewunger@gmail.com or text at 571.276.4722 if interested! All extras welcome (no auditions necessary) and Jeremy applicants should get an email with a prompt for remote auditions within the next two weeks. Thanks!

I Esbjerg centrum, d. 19., 20. og 21. september.

items.summary:
**CASTINGCALL!!!! (UL√òNNET)**

Hej alle sammen. Vi er et ambiti√∏st hold unge filmskabere fra Potemkin - Den Jyske Filmskoles Masterclass, der s√∏ger skuespillere til vores f√∏rste projekt dette semester.

 

**RESUME**: En velkl√¶dt bankmand hj√¶lper en blind mand over en bro, men bliver bestj√•let i processen. Da han ops√∏ger ham for at f√• sine ting tilbage, opdager han, at ‚Äúden blinde‚Äù fors√∏rger en fattig familie gennem sm√•bedrag. Konfrontationen blotl√¶gger kontrasten mellem de sm√• forbrydelser, der holder en familie i live, og de store privilegier, som bankmanden selv dagligt opretholder ‚Äì og tvinger ham til at overveje, hvem der i virkeligheden er blind.

Hovedrollen er fundet og vi s√∏ger nu disse roller

**‚ÄúBLIND MAND‚Äù:**

En mand p√• omkring 35 √•r, fattig og arbejdsl√∏s, k√¶mper for at fors√∏rge sin kone og deres fire b√∏rn. I sin desperation ser han ingen anden udvej end at snyde folk for at skaffe mad p√• bordet. Han udgiver sig for at v√¶re blind ‚Äì en l√∏gn, der t√¶rer p√• hans samvittighed. Inderst inde skammer han sig over bedraget, men af ren n√∏d og afmagt f√∏ler han sig tvunget til at forts√¶tte, fordi han vil g√∏re alt for sin familie.

**ASSISTENT:**

En kvinde p√• omkring 25 √•r, der uden t√∏ven g√∏r, hvad der bliver sagt. Hun elsker b√•de sit arbejde og f√∏lelsen af magt, og hendes trivsel afh√¶nger af, at hendes chef er tilfreds. En glad chef giver hende ikke bare gl√¶de, men ogs√• mulige bonusser og fordele.

**ET PAR (MAND & DAME):**

Ungt √¶gtepar, der bliver afvist et l√•n i Banken.

Mand - 25-40

Kvinde - 25-40

**BARISTA: **

18-25, k√∏n underordnet - ung energisk barista

**GADETIGGER:**

Stereotypisk gadetigger udseende og adf√¶rd s√∏ges til denne rolle.

**Praktisk**: 

Optagelserne foreg√•r i og omkring Aarhus C. mellem den 8.-10. september. 

Casting kommer til at foreg√• mandag/tirsdag 1./2. september. p√• Potemkin - Den Jyske Filmskole, Fredens Torv 3A, Aarhus C - Respektive specifikke tidspunkter aftales over mail.

**We are based in Myrtle Beach but travel**

**For appointme‚Ä¶
items.summary:
**OPEN AUDITIONS**

**We are based in Myrtle Beach but travel**

**For appointment and sides email Head Shot & Resume to**

**Anthony.kateridge@yahoo.com**

 

           We are looking for 2 cast members to work on our traveling team of actors for our lighthearted murder mystery centered around a wacky Mob family. YOU MUST HAVE GOOD IMPROV CHOPS show is totally interactive with the audience from the second they walk into the venue. Show is very flexible lots of room for improv script is more of a guideline as long as storyline stays constant. The killer, victim and the reason for the murder WILL change nightly. Actors must OWN their characters and make the part their own at the same time be able to leave their egos at the door. We are all equals in this cast Eventually all actors should be able to switch roles with each other making for fun and different scenarios.

** **

**Tina / Tommy (30 + Male or Female):** Wanna be singer the boss is trying to push. Boss has record company people there to see performance even though he has never heard *him or her sing* Only knows son -in- law says singer constantly sings at Pizzeria. Prefer someone that cannot sing a note although if you can sing, we can work that into the show. Day job is pizza maker in the Pizza Business run by Boss' son-in-law. Female singer acts like they are the best since Cher / Celine Dion and Male acts like he is Tom Jones/Elvis & Mick Jager all rolled into one

 

 

**ANGIE CANNOLLI***** (*****Female 30+)**

She is Food and Beverage Manger at this event.  She works for her Dads Legit business and only hired her husband to be here tonight, as the group was so huge. She has a vague clue about life and Only half understands Dad‚Äôs Business. She just knows everyone is afraid of him. She‚Äôs not happy husband & dad are there at same time here. Knows her father hates him.

items.title:
**Project Type**: Feature Film
**Casting Locations**: New York City, NY; Miami, ‚Ä¶
items.summary:
**Project Type**: Feature Film
**Casting Locations**: New York City, NY; Miami, FL, London
**Roles**:
* **Pandora**: Day Player, Female, 25‚Äì30
* **Newscaster**: Lead, Female, 30‚Äì45
* **Radicaux Member**: Day Player, Female, 25‚Äì30

**IMDB: **[https://www.imdb.com/title/tt16121314/](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt16121314/)

**Production:** Manhattan Project Films
1. **Pandora** (Day Player, Female, 25‚Äì30)

**Role Description**:
Pandora is a mysterious and enigmatic figure who appears at a pivotal moment in the film. She is not bound by conventional morality and operates in the gray areas of the law. Her motivations are unclear, and she serves as both an ally and a potential threat to the protagonist.

**Character Traits**:
* **Appearance**: Striking and memorable, with an unconventional beauty that draws attention.
* **Personality**: Charismatic and manipulative, with a calm demeanor that hides a calculating mind.
* **Skills**: Highly intelligent, resourceful, and adept at reading people.
* **Backstory**: Little is known about her past, adding to her mystique.

**Character Arc**:
Pandora's role is to challenge the protagonist's perceptions and decisions, pushing them to confront their own moral compass. Her true intentions remain ambiguous throughout the film, keeping both the protagonist and the audience on edge

2. **Newscaster** (Lead, Female, 30‚Äì45)

**Role Description**:
The Newscaster is the voice of authority and information in the film. She anchors the narrative's exposition, delivering crucial updates and insights that drive the plot forward. Her reports are often the first indication of escalating events in the city.

**Character Traits**:
* **Appearance**: Professional and polished, with a commanding presence.
* **Personality**: Composed, articulate, and empathetic, with a strong sense of duty.
* **Skills**: Exceptional communication abilities, quick thinking, and a deep understanding of the city's dynamics.
* **Backstory**: A seasoned journalist with years of experience in the field, she has witnessed the city's transformation over time.

**Character Arc**:
The Newscaster's role is to provide context and clarity amidst the chaos. As the story unfolds, her reports become more urgent and personal, reflecting the growing tension and her own emotional investment in the events.

3. **Radicaux Member** (Day Player, Female, 25‚Äì30)

**Role Description**:
The Radicaux Member is a passionate and dedicated activist involved in underground movements. She is a catalyst for change, challenging the status quo and advocating for the marginalized. Her actions are driven by a deep-seated belief in justice and equality.

**Character Traits**:
* **Appearance**: Edgy and distinctive, with a style that reflects her rebellious nature.
* **Personality**: Determined, fearless, and persuasive, with a strong moral compass.
* **Skills**: Organizational prowess, public speaking, and strategic planning.
* **Backstory**: Raised in a community that valued activism, she has been involved in various causes from a young age.

**Character Arc**:
The Radicaux Member's journey is one of sacrifice and resilience. She faces numerous challenges and setbacks but remains steadfast in her mission. Her actions inspire others and serve as a reminder of the power of collective action.

Please DM if you are in the North East of Scotland and able to do a rehearsal and a shoot over 1 day and 1 night. Schedule to be confirmed.

‚ÄúScrooge! (Abbreviated Version)‚Äù 

Book, Music and Lyrics by Leslie Bricusse

From A Christmas Carol by Charles Dickens

A one-hour adaptation of the crowd-pleasing holiday musical!

In 1970, renowned writer/composer/lyricist Leslie Bricusse adapted the classic Charles Dickens tale A Christmas Carol into the hit screen musical Scrooge! 

A charming stage musical, Scrooge! 

Lyons Community Theatre

Auditions: Will be held at Planet Bluegrass Lab Building(Directions), on Friday, Oct 3rd, 5-7pm; Sunday, Oct 5th,  1-3pm and Monday, Oct 6th, 5-7pm  (If none of these days or times work for you, please contact georgi.pollard@gmail.com by Sunday, Oct 5th @12pm

Performance dates:

Friday, December 12th, 2025 @7pm 

Saturday, December 13th, 2025 @2pm & 7pm

Sunday, December 14th, 2025 @2pm 

@Planet Bluegrass Wildflower Pavillion 

All auditioners  will be asked to sing 16 measures from the musical or a verse from a familiar holiday song.

We will dance a few moves and those wanting a speaking role will read from the script. Everyone is encouraged to show off your English accent!  Although not necessary, you are welcome to bring a prepared song to share.  We will have an accompanist.

Roles are Non-Union | Unpaid

LCT encourages actors of all races, ethnicities, genders, ages, and abilities all ages to audition, welcoming performers from all backgrounds.

items.title:
CASTING CALL

SITE SPECIFIC THEATRE 

Experienced and serious actor with strong ‚Ä¶
items.summary:
CASTING CALL

SITE SPECIFIC THEATRE 

Experienced and serious actor with strong focus, intuition and comic timing needed for a single person site specific English language play, that takes place in a car with only four audience members (who are also in the car). Age and gender is not specified. Must be available for performances in late-May or April with a month of rehearsal before. Pay is from ticket sales profit share, with majority to the performer. Performance will be presented under the umbrella of a Berlin performance venue.

Short pitch: Four people are invited to view a car for sale, what unfolds is a touching and strange monologue from the seller about modern alienation, the death of ennui and the managed decline of our futures. With their headspace stuck somewhere between an endlessly distracted doom scroll and a deep and meaningful, the seller tries to attempt to truly connect with the possible buyers. All whilst being unsure if they can actually let go of the sacred decaying automobile.

For archive and promotion much of the dress rehearsal will be filmed with cinema cameras and produced to a high standard not normally available to underground theatre. Whilst the number of audience members will be very limited this video and promotional material will be of a very high standard. 

About me: I'm a Melbourne born, Berlin/London based film director diving back into theatre after a long hiatus. A creative space I'm looking forward to diving into in site specific experimental pieces over the coming year. I‚Äôm on the hunt for performers in Berlin hungry to do thought provoking, fresh and intense work. The world is on fire. Let‚Äôs make things that we can be proud of, before we‚Äôre all burnt. You can see a large portfolio of my film work here: [**https://vimeo.com/timkelly**]

Before April 10, please email relevant portfolio materials to: [timothygeorgekelly@gmail.com] with subject: ‚ÄúCarpark Casting‚Äù

items.title:
# CASTING CALL: JOIN OUR ACTING PODCAST

When a group of actors sit around a tab‚Ä¶
items.summary:
# CASTING CALL: JOIN OUR ACTING PODCAST

When a group of actors sit around a table and use their spoken words to portray characters all going on an adventure together, that's called a tabletop roleplaying game (TTRPG). Our gaming group plays a variety of tabletop roleplaying games and publishes the audio as a podcast. Example famous ttrpg podcasts: Critical Role, The Adventure Zone, etc. We react as our character to the scenario presented by the game master. We respond to challenges, overcome obstacles, make jokes and laugh with our fellow acting friends. Would you enjoy acting in-character for a podcast audience? Join us.

# When we play:

Weekends. Both European and American time zones. Joining us doesn't commit you to every weekend. Instead, we pick games we want to try and sign up for those calendar spots.

# How long we play / what it‚Äôs like:

Our members sit at their microphones for four hours talking their way through an adventure using their words and laughter to entertain each other. We use theater of the mind, saying out loud how far away targets are instead of looking at combat maps on a screen. The recordings are high quality, and we air the audio as a podcast. Don‚Äôt worry, we don‚Äôt publish our names or faces.

# System played:

We get to learn and play a different tabletop roleplaying game (ttrpg) system each session. There‚Äôs no financial burden to you. The systems are either free to everyone or we were sent a free promotional copy from its creator.

# Oneshot or campaign:

Both. Like a traditional campaign, we repeatedly meet familiar non player characters (NPCs), facing challenges and experiencing long term character growth. We play our same character for a year. Our characters start at low power in January, grow to epic max fighting strength by December, then retire. Like a oneshot, each individual episode opens with a beginning to its plot, and the exploration of its story ends after four hours.

# Game Mastering (GMing):

We rotate so that everyone is invited to be a player and a game master if they want. The GM gets to pick which ttrpg we play that weekend. If you find a fun ttrpg you want to try, you can sign up as the GM and be confident that there will be players excited to play with you. If you prefer to be a player every time that‚Äôs cool, too. Our members don't have to GM ever if they want a break from it. Getting to pick how often you GM really helps relieve burnout. GM as often as makes you happy.

# You can vibe check past games:

We're on itunes, spotify, youtube, and all the podcast apps. Our cast rotates. Skip around and listen to snippets from a few episodes to see which of our members you want to play with first. The episodes aren't all great, but we have fun together. This isn't a job. It's a hobby, a way to relax and laugh meeting new people who slowly over time become lifelong friends. It's okay to miss games; you aren‚Äôt expected to be present for every session. The opt-in format naturally minimizes table trouble because you can see who‚Äôs signed up to GM and play in a game before you join it, and can pick dates that have people you‚Äôre looking forward to playing with.

# Joining:

To join, email us at FirebreathingKittensPodcast at gmail dot com and tell us about your equipment. Our minimum requirement is 24 bit audio (not 16 bit). If you don‚Äôt know what 24 bit audio means that‚Äôs not a problem, the new members tab of FirebreathingKittensPodcast dot com has an equipment section that explains what all the microphone words mean with pictures and videos. We welcome members of all experience levels and will train you. The new members tab also has info about our format and answers to frequently asked questions. Minimum age 21 years old. We reply to all emails from people who have 24 bit audio within three days with a support agreement for you to sign, and then will guide you through character creation and train you how to record great audio.

items.summary:
For a commercial filming in Paris with a well established French production company and amazing director on the 13th September French casting director Rachel Desmarest is looking for English speaking children aged 5 - 9 years old, from all backgrounds and ethnicities based in France and UK. We are looking to create two "duos" that know each other (so each child has a friend they know on the shoot) - this can be brothers, sisters, friends, cousins, neighbours.. No need for prior experience, this is a perfect first experience for children and a good introduction to the film industry. It's a very fun project they will be able to share as a duo, and the director is really great with children. There is a good budget which is tailored to the requirements of French law and practice concerning children and transport, hotel, chaperone and meals will be provided for children who live far from Paris.

If your child / children are available for shoot on the 13th September and wish to participate, please send in headshot and a short presentation video explaining (in English) why he / she would like to take part in a commercial along with contact details for parents asap and by the latest midnight on Saturday 6th september to the following email :

racheldesmarestcastingbox@gmail.com

Please indicate "Paris commercial 13th sep+country of residence of child (UK/FRANCE)" in the subject of your mail

Many thanks !

items.title:
****Casting Call****
We are looking for enthusiastic, reliable people who just l‚Ä¶
items.summary:
****Casting Call****
We are looking for enthusiastic, reliable people who just love Christmas and want to help to create some magical memories for our visiting families.

You must be able to improvise and remain in your character at all times. Full training will be given.

Our standards are very high and our reputation is very well known locally for providing a magical family Christmas Experience that is affordable to all. We are a happy, professional team and you will be provided with excellent working conditions. Many of our seasonal staff have been with us for many years, which speaks volumes.

Must be local to CM36HB, Essex and have transport to get to and from the venue (as public transport is not reliable in our area).

We run from mid November to, and including the 23rd December. You do not have to commit to every opening day but you will need to work at least 16 sessions (long days are classed as 2 sessions).

Open to everyone over the age of 16

We are open weekends and once we get to December also after school.

We are looking for:
Santa - natural beard preferred but we do provide top quality, human hair beards. Must have a wholesome attitude to Christmas
Mother Christmas - someone who will make the children feel at ease but who can control a section of elves
Elves - we have elves of all ages, we just need enthusiasm and a fun loving attitude
Train Driver for The Santa Express

If you think you would be perfect, please email info@thepartykingdom.co.uk telling us why you would be perfect, which character you would like to play and include a headshot

Renumeration will vary depending on the character and previous experience and will be confirmed once we have received your email.
We cannot wait to hear form you xxx

We are The Easy English Theatre and we are looking for acto‚Ä¶

Good morning to all,
We are The Easy English Theatre and we are looking for actors and actresses.

Who are we?
The Easy English Theatre ([https://www.divadloanglicky.cz/](https://www.divadloanglicky.cz/)) is a unique project that brings language education to Czech students in a fun and engaging way.

We will be doing a 2-week tour from 3rd to 14th November 2025. The tour will take place in multiple Czech cities, and performances will be held in theatres and cultural centres with capacities of 300‚Äì500 people. The schedule runs Monday to Friday, mornings until lunchtime only.

We are looking for one young woman and one young man with an acting age of 18‚Äì25. We are specifically looking for native British English speakers who enjoy working with children and teenagers and would like to discover some beautiful parts of the Czech Republic.

We will cover all expenses (accommodation, food, travel) and offer a fee of ¬£600 per week.

If you're interested, please send us a short video showcasing yourself as an actor to divadloanglicky@gmail.com.
We‚Äôre looking forward to meeting you!
